name: Hero's Defense
description:
Hero's Defense is a top down waved based defense game. Use  your abilities and traps to take down waves of unrelenting robots and zombies.

In the year 2106 earth is on the verge of extinction due to pollution and lack of resources, scientists last hope is to invest into interdimensional portals to potentially find another safer earth. During a scouting mission of earth 409 the portals reactors malfunction causing a mass overload of portal rifts to open unleashing horrors from other worlds long destroyed. Scouter #24 is humanities last hope in defending his world from total annihilation.

Will he succeed or will the unending waves of enemies get the best of him?

FEATURES

Use you Gun, Abilities and Traps to fend off the hordes from reaching your portal.
